SEARCH
Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app

Interface AppInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
App
public interface AppInterface
AppInterface --- Holds the default commands that should be the only things read by Recorder and Persistency for testing.

  • Field Details

    • TICK_RATE

      static final int TICK_RATE
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • updateGraphics

      void updateGraphics()
      updateGraphics() Sends an update request to graphics to update the graphics. Used after updating state in domain.

    • giveInput

      void giveInput(nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app.Inputs.Command input)
      giveInput() Takes in an input, and sends to the domain to update state.
      Parameters:
      input - An input in the game, e.g WASD as a command.

    • initialStateRevert

      void initialStateRevert()
      initialStateRevert() Tells domain to revert to the starting state of the game. Like a reset. This is used by recorder to go from the start, so it can undo moves.

    • pauseTimer

      void pauseTimer(boolean state)
      pauseTimer Pauses or resumes the game based on the state given. True is pause, False is resume.
      Parameters:
      state - True for pause, false for resume

    • openFile

      String openFile()
      openFile() Opens a file at the given location. Note that it is expected to handle the "" case when no file is inputted.
      Returns:
      File name.

    • saveFile

      String saveFile()
      saveFile() Saves a file at the given location. Note that it is expected to handle the "" case when no file is inputted.
      Returns:
      File name.
